name: structToSorted
syntax:
structToSorted(structure, callback)
structToSorted(structure, sorttype, sortorder, localeSensitive)
description: Converts a struct to an ordered one

params.name: structure
params.description: Structure or a variable that contains one.

params.name: callback
params.description: Closure or function reference that will be called for each iteration. Should return -1, 0 or 1.

callback_params.description: The value of the first key/value pair
callback_params.name: value1

callback_params.description: The value of the second key/value pair
callback_params.name: value2

callback_params.description: The key name of the first key/value pair
callback_params.name: key1

callback_params.description: The key name of the second key/value pair
callback_params.name: key2

params.name: sortorder
params.description:
* asc: ascending (a to z) sort order.
* desc: descending (z to a) sort order

params.name: localeSensitive
params.description: Respect locale-specific characters (including support for umlaut characters) while sorting (applies to type"text").

examples.title: structToSorted  with an inline function sorting by key value
examples.description: Use a function to sort the keys by numeric value descending
examples.result: A new struct with the keys ordered by value descending

examples.title: structToSorted  member function with an inline function sorting by key value
examples.description: Use a function to sort the keys by numeric value descending
examples.result: A new struct with the keys ordered by value descending

examples.title: structToSorted  member function with an inline function sorting by key name
examples.description: Use a function to sort the keys by name
examples.result: A new struct with the keys ordered by key name

examples.title: structToSorted  member function with sorttype argument
examples.description: Use a function to sort the keys by name
examples.result: A new struct with the keys ordered by key name
